Articles.Content: So on KSP Wiki, I have read that you need to press Options and F12 to open the debug tool bar. Instead, it opens up my system preferences!! Help?????![:huh:](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_undecided.gif)
If you're on Mac try Ctrl instead. I can't remember which I used on my Mac. You can also rebind the keys (in KSP or in System Preferences, whichever you prefer).
What operating system are you using? Windows, Mac, Linux?
I am using Mac OS X Yosemite
Can you try changing the Key that it uses in Settings?
